mapper.select: SELECT COUNT , A.USER_ID , A.USER_TYPE , B.USER_NAME , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.REPLY , A.TIME , A.WRITER , A.ANSWER , A.ANSWER_TIME FROM QNA_INQUIRE A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_TYPE = B.USER_TYPE ORDER BY REPLY, COUNT DESC LIMIT ${index} , ${amount}

SELECT COUNT(COUNT) FROM QNA_INQUIRE WHERE 1=1
AND REPLY = #{reply}
SELECT SUM(IF(USER_TYPE = '0', 1, 0)) 'ADMIN' , SUM(IF(USER_TYPE = '1', 1, 0)) 'USER' , SUM(IF(USER_TYPE = '2', 1, 0)) 'BUSINESS' FROM MEMBER;

SELECT R.RES_NUMBER , P.PEN_NAME, R.RM_NAME , M.USER_NAME, R.USER_ID , R.CHECK_IN_D, R.CHECK_IN_T , R.CHECK_OUT_D, R.CHECK_OUT_T , R.RES_TIME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN PENSION P ON (P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = R.USER_ID) AND M.USER_TYPE = R.USER_TYPE;
SELECT SUM(CAST(RM_PRICE AS UNSIGNED)) FROM RESERVATION

SELECT P.PEN_ID , P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , COUNT(R.RES_NUMBER) AS 'RES_COUNT' , IFNULL(SUM(CAST(R.RM_PRICE AS UNSIGNED)), 0) AS 'PAYMENT' , SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(R.RES_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d')) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(R.RES_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) THEN CAST(R.RM_PRICE AS UNSIGNED) ELSE 0 END) AS 'M_PAYMENT' , SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(R.RES_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d')) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(R.RES_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'M_RES_COUNT' FROM RESERVATION R RIGHT OUTER JOIN PENSION P ON R.PEN_ID = P.PEN_ID GROUP BY P.PEN_ID, P.PEN_NAME ORDER BY PAYMENT DESC

SELECT P.PEN_ID , P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , CAST(IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(R.REV_STAR), 0), 0) AS UNSIGNED) AS 'STAR' , COUNT(R.REV_NUM) AS 'RV' FROM PENSION P LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID GROUP BY P.PEN_ID ORDER BY RV DESC;
